title: Ensuring dignity kits are inclusive
description: “I am so happy to see these arrangements for us. After the pandemic, we were scattered about, and we don’t have any income. I don’t even have a proper place to live at the moment, and the place where I am staying could go underwater any minute.”

title: Refuge after fleeing violence
description: “I was in the middle of teaching my class when we heard gunshots and explosions. I had to calm myself down and make sure all my students were safe.”

title: A new start through business
description: “Can you believe we saved money for three months, and now we have our own business?” asked Xamaro.

title: A new home for people  fleeing violence
Health care for mothers and children who fled violence
description: “Our house was burnt down.When we fled, we lost everything. I don’t know in which direction my husband left.”
